titleStmt.title: A true relation of the former faithful and long service with the present most unjust imprisonment of Anthony Mellidge, sometime called a captain; now in scorn called a Quaker.
titleStmt.author: Mellidge, Anthony.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated on A4r: Anthony Mellidge. Dover, .. the 25. day of the twelfth moneth 1656.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
